alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brevard County through 345 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Viera, or 7 miles south of Rockledge. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Melbourne, Rockledge, Cocoa Beach, Satellite Beach and Merritt Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
